transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+3% Ally Team Critical Hit Chance
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+3% Ally Team Critical Hit Chance
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Chilling, Isn't It?
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases when the caster is granted a buff.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Shocked Chance +50%\nInflicts an additional Shocked for 2 turns

SKT_BURST_3.effect: <color=#FFBF00>Enhanced Attack</color>\nResets all skill cooldowns\nHelp Me, Sis guaranteed activation

description: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000082_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000082_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases when the caster is granted a buff.

SKT_SECOND.name: Help Me, Sis!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) When an ally <color=#28d9ed>Ranger</color> attacks, activates an additional attack on the enemy with the highest Speed. After attacking, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>25%</color>, and grants increased Effectiveness to ally <color=#28d9ed>Mages</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Rangers</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: (Triggered Effect) When an ally <color=#28d9ed>Ranger</color> attacks, activates an additional attack on the enemy with the highest Speed. After attacking, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000082_2_2]</color>, and grants increased Effectiveness to ally <color=#28d9ed>Mages</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Rangers</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000082_2_3] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Twin Tornado!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> once on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportionally to the number of debuffs inflicted on the target. This skill always has elemental advantage.
description: Inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Shocked</color> once on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000082_3_1] turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportionally to the number of debuffs inflicted on the target. This skill always has elemental advantage.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict Shocked on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict Shocked for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000082_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Shocked on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000082_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000082_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Shocked for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000082_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
